title: Koreans Sweep Top 3 Spots in Women's World Golf Rankings
text:
Korean golfers swept the top three spots for the first time in the latest Rolex Women's World Golf Rankings released on Monday.

Ko Jin-young continued her reign at No. 1, while Park Sung-hyun remained at No. 2 for the 10th consecutive week. Lee Jeong-eun moved up a spot to No. 3, edging Lexi Thompson of the U.S. into fourth place.

This is the first time players of the same nationality have occupied the top three spots since the rankings first appeared in 2006.

Another Korean golfer, Park In-bee, stayed in the top 10, climbing two spots to No. 8.
description: Koreans Sweep Top 3 Spots in Women's World Golf Rankings
